title: Tent Sale & Demo Day
desc: Come ride the new 2016?s while saving a bundle on your favorite genuine BMW accessories and apparel! Reserve your bike for a guided extended demo ride along the Arroyo. Wait for your test ride while enjoying refreshments and shopping our biggest sale on helmets, riding gear, accessories. Be sure to ask about our screaming deals on the last of our 2015 demo bikes!  ?
